subject: Constitution of 3 GMs Committee for approval of detailed estimate for change of scope order
text: HRrv Tlq TTATf uifetar-ut 3414 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 71 DI (Ts& qrae7 ai TTTATt 4TT4) Y4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 AT ? National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 U 6, 84zr-10, ERqT, Tf farh-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: Sth April, 2013 POLICY MATTER Technical (130/2013) Sub: Constitution of 3 GMs Committee for approval of detailed estimate for Change of Scope Order: It has been observed that normally for Change of Scope in PPP Projects 'in-principle approval is granted and detailed estimate thereof is received subsequently for approval: It has, therefore, been decided that henceforth detailed estimate for Change of Scope recommended and received from RO ' Office may first be examined by a Committee of General Managers specially to certify its cost before   putting it to Executive Committee for approval. Accordingly, the constitution of 3 GMs   committee shall be as follows: GM of concerned division: (ii) 2 GMs to be nominated by concerned Member: Out of this, one GM must be from outside the jurisdiction of Member concerned. 2. This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI. 4 V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) To, AILofficers and employees of HQ/ROs[PIUs[CMUs[Site Offices NHAI
